languages.text: "Знаете, мне кажется чертовски ироничным, что мой дар позволяет мне видеть будущее, при том, что мысли о будущем — это то, чего я избегала любой ценой. Средства всякие, шуточки, истории о старых добрых деньках — я за ними пряталась как за ширмой. Не высовывайся и все будет хорошо. Так я считала, по крайней мере".

traits.locale_text: "Знаете, мне кажется чертовски ироничным, что мой дар позволяет мне видеть будущее, при том, что мысли о будущем — это то, чего я избегала любой ценой. Средства всякие, шуточки, истории о старых добрых деньках — я за ними пряталась как за ширмой. Не высовывайся и все будет хорошо. Так я считала, по крайней мере".

languages.text: "You know, I think it's pretty ironic that my gift lets me see the future, when thinking about the future is the thing I'll do anything to avoid. Substances of all kinds, jokes, stories about the good old days — I hide under them all like a blanket. As long as I don't poke my head out, everything will be okay. At least, that's what I thought."
languages.original_text: "Знаете, мне кажется чертовски ироничным, что мой дар позволяет мне видеть будущее, при том, что мысли о будущем — это то, чего я избегала любой ценой. Средства всякие, шуточки, истории о старых добрых деньках — я за ними пряталась как за ширмой. Не высовывайся и все будет хорошо. Так я считала, по крайней мере".

Substances of all kinds, jokes, stories about the good old days — I hide under them all like a blanket. As long as I don't poke my head out, everything will be OK. At least, that's what I thought."

"You know, I think it's pretty ironic that my gift lets me see the future, when thinking about the future is the thing I'll do anything to avoid. Substances of all kinds, jokes, stories about the good old days — I hide under them all like a blanket. As long as I don't poke my head out, everything will be OK. At least, that's what I thought."

"You know, I think it's pretty ironic that my gift lets me see the future, when thinking about the future is the thing I'll do anything to avoid. Substances of all kinds, jokes, stories about the good old days — I hide under them all like a blanket. As long as I don't poke my head out, everything will be OK. At least, that's what I thought."

"You know, I think it's pretty ironic that my gift lets me see the future, when thinking about the future is the thing I'll do anything to avoid. Substances of all kinds, jokes, stories about the good old days — I hide under them all like a blanket. As long as I don't poke my head out, everything will be OK. At least, that's what I thought."

languages.text: “说真的，我觉得这很讽刺。我的能力让我看到了未来，可我却一直都不愿意思考未来的事情。我靠着各种各样的药物、笑话，还有那些关于过去美好时光的故事。我躲在这些东西下面，就像躲在毯子下面一样。只要不把头伸出来，一切都会好起来的，至少我以前就是这么想的。”
languages.original_text: "You know, I think it's pretty ironic that my gift lets me see the future, when thinking about the future is the thing I'll do anything to avoid. Substances of all kinds, jokes, stories about the good old days — I hide under them all like a blanket. As long as I don't poke my head out, everything will be okay. At least, that's what I thought."

traits.locale_text: “说真的，我觉得这很讽刺。我的能力让我看到了未来，可我却一直都不愿意思考未来的事情。我靠着各种各样的药物、笑话，还有那些关于过去美好时光的故事。我躲在这些东西下面，就像躲在毯子下面一样。只要不把头伸出来，一切都会好起来的，至少我以前就是这么想的。”

languages.original_text: "You know, I think it's pretty ironic that my gift lets me see the future, when thinking about the future is the thing I'll do anything to avoid. Substances of all kinds, jokes, stories about the good old days — I hide under them all like a blanket. As long as I don't poke my head out, everything will be OK. At least, that's what I thought."

languages.text: «¿Sabe? Me parece bastante irónico que mi don me permita ver el futuro, cuando lo que más quiero evitar es pensar en el futuro. Sustancias de todo tipo, bromas, historias sobre los viejos tiempos... me oculto debajo de todo eso, como si fueran una manta. Mientras no saque la cabeza, todo irá bien. O eso pensaba, al menos».
languages.original_text: "You know, I think it's pretty ironic that my gift lets me see the future, when thinking about the future is the thing I'll do anything to avoid. Substances of all kinds, jokes, stories about the good old days — I hide under them all like a blanket. As long as I don't poke my head out, everything will be okay. At least, that's what I thought."

traits.locale_text: «¿Sabe? Me parece bastante irónico que mi don me permita ver el futuro, cuando lo que más quiero evitar es pensar en el futuro. Sustancias de todo tipo, bromas, historias sobre los viejos tiempos... me oculto debajo de todo eso, como si fueran una manta. Mientras no saque la cabeza, todo irá bien. O eso pensaba, al menos».

languages.text: 「知っての通り、あたいの能力は未来を見ることができることよ。でも、あたいは未来について考えることは避けたいの。とても皮肉なことだけどね。あらゆる種類の物質、ジョーク、昔話…あたいはそれを毛布のようにして、その下に隠れているの。顔を出さない限り、すべてがうまくいくのよ。少なくとも、あたいはそう思っていたわ」
languages.original_text: "You know, I think it's pretty ironic that my gift lets me see the future, when thinking about the future is the thing I'll do anything to avoid. Substances of all kinds, jokes, stories about the good old days — I hide under them all like a blanket. As long as I don't poke my head out, everything will be okay. At least, that's what I thought."

traits.locale_text: 「知っての通り、あたいの能力は未来を見ることができることよ。でも、あたいは未来について考えることは避けたいの。とても皮肉なことだけどね。あらゆる種類の物質、ジョーク、昔話…あたいはそれを毛布のようにして、その下に隠れているの。顔を出さない限り、すべてがうまくいくのよ。少なくとも、あたいはそう思っていたわ」

languages.text: "Ironie des Schicksals, dass meine Gabe mich die Zukunft sehen lässt, wo ich doch alles tue, um jeden Gedanken an die Zukunft zu verhindern. Substanzen jedweder Art, Witze, Geschichten über die gute alte Zeit — ich verstecke mich unter all dem wie unter einer Decke. So lange ich nur den Kopf nicht herausstrecke, wird alles gut. Zumindest dachte ich das."
languages.original_text: "You know, I think it's pretty ironic that my gift lets me see the future, when thinking about the future is the thing I'll do anything to avoid. Substances of all kinds, jokes, stories about the good old days — I hide under them all like a blanket. As long as I don't poke my head out, everything will be okay. At least, that's what I thought."

traits.locale_text: "Ironie des Schicksals, dass meine Gabe mich die Zukunft sehen lässt, wo ich doch alles tue, um jeden Gedanken an die Zukunft zu verhindern. Substanzen jedweder Art, Witze, Geschichten über die gute alte Zeit — ich verstecke mich unter all dem wie unter einer Decke. So lange ich nur den Kopf nicht herausstrecke, wird alles gut. Zumindest dachte ich das."

languages.text: « Vous savez, c'est quand même ironique que mon don me permette de voir l'avenir, alors que je fais tout mon possible pour éviter d'y penser. Je me préserve derrière les substances de toutes sortes, les blagues et les histoires du bon vieux temps comme on se cacherait sous des couvertures. Tant que je reste dans ma cachette, tout ira bien. Du moins, c'est ce que je croyais, »
languages.original_text: "You know, I think it's pretty ironic that my gift lets me see the future, when thinking about the future is the thing I'll do anything to avoid. Substances of all kinds, jokes, stories about the good old days — I hide under them all like a blanket. As long as I don't poke my head out, everything will be okay. At least, that's what I thought."

traits.locale_text: « Vous savez, c'est quand même ironique que mon don me permette de voir l'avenir, alors que je fais tout mon possible pour éviter d'y penser. Je me préserve derrière les substances de toutes sortes, les blagues et les histoires du bon vieux temps comme on se cacherait sous des couvertures. Tant que je reste dans ma cachette, tout ira bien. Du moins, c'est ce que je croyais, »

languages.text: "Geleceğe dair düşüncelerden kendimi azat etmek için ne gerekiyorsa yapacağımı ele alalım. Yeteneğimin geleceği görmemi sağlaması bir hayli ironik, değil mi? Her türden madde, espri, eski günleri yâd ettiğim hikâyeler... Battaniye misali onların altına saklanırdım. Kafamı çıkarmadığım sürece sorun yoktu, en azından öyle düşünürdüm..."
languages.original_text: "You know, I think it's pretty ironic that my gift lets me see the future, when thinking about the future is the thing I'll do anything to avoid. Substances of all kinds, jokes, stories about the good old days — I hide under them all like a blanket. As long as I don't poke my head out, everything will be okay. At least, that's what I thought."

traits.locale_text: "Geleceğe dair düşüncelerden kendimi azat etmek için ne gerekiyorsa yapacağımı ele alalım. Yeteneğimin geleceği görmemi sağlaması bir hayli ironik, değil mi? Her türden madde, espriler, eski günleri yâd ettiğim hikâyeler... Battaniye misali onların altına saklanırdım. Kafamı çıkarmadığım sürece sorun yoktu, en azından öyle düşünürdüm..."
